Welcome.accessIntroduction: Apna Bloom ka safar shuru karne ke liye {partnerName} dwara diya gaya access code daaliye.
Welcome.publicIntroduction: Bloom ke courses shuru karne ke liye humare saath account banaiye ya fir pehle Bloom ke bare mein aur janiye.
Welcome.continueCoursesDescription: Jahan se aapne choda tha, vahan se shuru kariye
